events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 29th, requesting to file a claim for damages sustained.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details and identifying keywords related to car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim and contact the policyholder for further information.
The claim filing has been officially acknowledged, and confirmation sent to the customer, ensuring their case is now active.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s statement documents from the claimant for processing the claim.
Customer has submitted all required documents including the accident report and vehicle damage photographs.
Investigation into the vehicle accident claim has commenced, reviewing submitted evidence and verifying incident details.
Investigation report finalized, confirming liability and extent of damages to the claimant’s vehicle following the collision.
A preliminary settlement was proposed to the customer based on assessed damages and policy coverage.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved after acceptance of the settlement terms by the policyholder.
Payment for the approved claim amount was processed and issued to the claimant’s bank account.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the insured party.
All documents and correspondence related to the closed auto accident claim have been archived for recordkeeping.
